metadata.name: Montage
metadata.description:
Life in the city is complicated by chaos. Structures loom and cast deep shadows, advertisements scream for attention and the noise of constant motion is omnipresent. Glass offers me a refuge from the nonstop noise and I have learned to find balance in the reflected pandemonium. 
Within these images are the past and the future locked into the present. 

Single shot that resembles a montage, taken in Warsaw. 

Title: Montage
Edition: 1/1
Collection: City - Fascinating Disarray
Artist: ERIK WITSOE
Dimensions: 4586 x 3057
Location: Warsaw, Poland

License: Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries and essays by holder of the NFT, as long as creator is credited. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with creator.
